name: The Tale of Ducks
description:
This game is based on historically accurate facts concerning a duck belonging to a rare species of duck. This game shows you their way of life , their habit, their diet and how they lived together. The game is vastly story-based with light gameplay elements.

The game requires mouse input only.

HUD and instructions are NOT explicitly provided to maintain immersiveness.

Playing with sound is recommended for a full experience.

Disclaimer:

The game contains animated blood and may be uncomfortable for some.
